# hashicorpversions Provider

The hashicorpversions provider is used to retrieve the latest version of any of the HashiCorp suite of tools.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "hashicorpversions" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

The hashicorpversions provider requires no configuration as it operates against an endpoint that requires no authentication.
